The writer received a phone call from the evening manager, who reported that $20 had been withdrawn from the residentâ€™s account and provided to the resident upon his request. Later in the shift, the sitter returned the $20 to the writer after the resident had gone to bed, stating to keep it safe and return it in the morning should the resident ask for it again. The $20 has been secured in the medication cart and will be endorsed to the incoming staff during shift handover.
